what_went_well: Fast integration of stable logic into the core engine
Successful cleanup of technical debt related to feature flags
what_could_improve: Automated sync of .d.ts files would prevent manual cleanup needs
unexpected_opportunities: Adding STABLE type allows better lifecycle tracking for future features
technical_insights: Promoting telemetry to permanent status ensures consistent observability across all environments

next_opportunities.immediate_expansion: Extend adaptive logic to rhythm and bowing technique
complementary_features: FEATURE_UI_INTONATION_HEATMAPS could use the promoted telemetry data

impact_assessment.financial_impact: Lower maintenance costs due to reduced complexity
impact_assessment.user_impact: 100% of users now benefit from adaptive difficulty
impact_assessment.competitive_impact: Superior personalization compared to static tutors
